summary: Create a marketing website for HS Media Agency (social media marketing agency) including contact details (phone, email, location) and an inquiry form.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Modern minimalist logo mark and wordmark for “HS Media Agency” (hs-media-agency-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Abstract social-media/marketing themed hero illustration with clean shapes and high contrast (hs-media-agency-hero.dim_1600x900.png)

existing_features.title: Create a responsive marketing website for a social media marketing agency named “HS Media Agency” with clear, English-language copy and a single-page layout that includes at minimum: a hero section, a services section, an about/why-us section, and a contact section.
Display the provided contact details in the contact section and anywhere else appropriate (e.g., header/footer): phone number +919234473077, email Teamharshsingh@gmail.com, and location Bihar.

Add an inquiry form that allows visitors to submit an inquiry to HS Media Agency. The form must include at least: full name, email, phone (optional), service interest (select), message, and a consent/acknowledgement checkbox; show inline validation and a success/error result state after submission.

Apply a cohesive, creative visual theme consistently across the site (colors, typography, spacing, and section styling) suitable for a modern marketing agency brand. Do not use a blue/purple primary palette.
Generate required static images and render them from frontend/public/assets/generated (do not serve images via the backend). Use the images in the marketing page layout (e.g., hero and branding).

new_feature_requests.summary: Build HS Media Agency website with contact details (phone +919234473077, email Teamharshsingh@gmail.com, location Bihar) and an inquiry form.

Implement backend support for inquiry submissions in the single Motoko main actor: define an Inquiry record type, store inquiries, and expose a public method to create an inquiry (and an optional method to list inquiries for future use).
